parameters: I will get you the boarding pass soon.

Please take a ticket, and wait for
the immigration officer to call you.
You also need to read the disclaimer.
It is on the front desk. Take a copy.
Step aside, sir. There are others to help.
Sorry but I have a question
Sorry but I have a question
Do you know where I can find my parents?
The center is very busy today!
You will have to find them yourself.
My wife and son were supposed to meet us here
We are still waiting for them.
I really hope they find their way to the
center in the middle of all this mess!
The boy is Vasyl, and my wife's name is Anna.
I am sorry. I don't think I have met them,
but I hope you will reunite soon.
We will. I am sure we will.
I am worried about my family.
How many family members are you?
Dad, what are we going to do?
I will tell you all about it, but first,
go see if others need help.
Explore the center and talk to everyone.
See if they need help. Then, come back
to us. We are waiting for you.
Collect the 9 other memory pieces by interacting
with the people and objects in the center.
Once you have all the pieces, talk to your father.
You’re back. How are you feeling?
No one really is ‘alright’ right now.
True. I’ve spoken to some of the other families here.
I did too, Dad. Everyone’s the same, and no one
We do know some things, though.
Yes, really. You are going to be safe.
That, you don’t need to worry about.
I mean, at least we’re leaving together.
Sorry? About what? Mom, do you know what
Your mother and I have been talking, and the
other men here are the same.
Honey, I can’t. I’ve made up my mind.
No, you can’t! We can’t go without you!
Where are we going to go?
I told you. Your grandparents need someone
Do you think they’d survive days in the car
like we took to get here?
And Olena... take care of you both, okay?
I will. I promise- I just- I’ll do it.
Alright, people, we’re opening the gate.
It’s time for you to go.
This situation isn’t in our control, champ.
But what about me? You don’t want to
abandon them, but what happens to me?
And what about Mom? That isn’t fair either!
You take care of your mother for me,
But... there has to be another way.
Why can’t you come with us?

What matters most is what we do from now on.
You two will build an amazing life.

We can’t linger here for too long.

Once you have all the pieces, talk to your father.
Your father has something to say to you.
I am glad we made it all together.
One of the IDs is missing!
I have to find it; otherwise,
my son won't be able to come with us.
The president is speaking to the people.
So many things are going on. It’s total chaos.
Will Grandma and Grandpa be able to get on the
Oh God, most of the city’s been destroyed.
Wasn’t that the park near school?
It looks like Canada is helping refugees.
I will always remember you like that.
I am looking for my parents.
The whole thing feels like a nightmare.
It is hard on the kids and elderly.
I am a foreman of the Mariupol metallurgical plant.
I lost an eye as a result of shelling, and a huge
I pulled my wife out from under the rubble already dead
while witnessing the destruction of my home by the Russian
I left Mariupol wounded along a road lined with corpses.
I do not want to stay in a country ruled by the Gestapo.
I will drive through Russia and went through the humiliations
in “filtration camps” there to get to my daughter in Greece
Oleksandr Lukashov, Mariupol, Donetsk Oblast, June 3, 2022
I hope you and daughter will reunite soon.
I am looking for my parents.
There are two people at the other
They seem to be waiting for someone.
Oh, I think they are my parent!
Can't wait to get to Greece.
If it was not for my son,
I would be dead by now.
He carried me outside the house.
We are still waiting for him.
I hope he picks up the phone.
Did you see my kids? I cannot seem to
I don't know your kids, sir.
I don't know your kids, sir.
I cannot lose my kids after I got here.
I was at work making phone calls when the shelling started.
I immediately thought of my two kids at school.
I stormed out of my office and drove all the way to
The school parking lot was crowded with parents who
came to pick up their children.
Many car doors were left open as the parents went to
the classes to take their kids.
People were terrified and the kids were crying and extremely
disturbed by the sound of the sirens.
I remembered that my wife is staying at home as she broke
her leg the other day. So, I had to help her before
I asked my neighbor to take my kids and meet me here at the
My wife and I have been waiting for our neighbor for 3 hours,
but it seems that something happened to him.
I am so stressed out! I really hope that my kids
My life is nothing without my family!

I hope it is just the traffic.

To be honest, I am confused and stressed
I am losing it too, but we have to
I am a wife and a mother of two small children.
My family is from a small town, Chorbnobayivka, north of
My husband was hit by shelling, after which we were forced
to move to the city of Mykolaiv.
My husband has been in the hospital for treatment for 2
During these 2 months he had lungs reconstruction surgery
At the moment he needs to undergo rehabilitation and a
We do not have the money for the rehabilitation and another
I hope my kids one day will be able to see their father
Oksana Ivanenko, Chornobaivka, Kherson Oblast, March, 2023
I am all hope he will recover soon,
Thank you for your kind wishes.
I hope we make it out of here

When will they allow us on board?!
Oh my God! What is this?
It seems that it is a teddy bear!
It is all covered in blood!
Someone must have been really hurt.

It has been more than two hours,
and he has not come back!
I am sure he is on his way.
This is the day when Ihor with his family arrived at the
immigration center to leave the country and flee to Canada.
